channel.title: [PI] Help with conditional teles (not player right stuff)
channel.description: mk so for my jad minigame you to have to solo it. Basicly there is a new copy of the level in the map every 4 spaces high you are (like godwars). I want it to be so that if a player is in 1 level, it teles you to the next level. can someone help with that. im thinking of pretty much copying like an area method, and using that as a condition, but i'll have to add like 40 methods... i want something smaller and neater.

item.title: [PI] Help with conditional teles (not player right stuff)
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

no. i want to know a cleaner way of making a method that checks if some1 is on a certain floor of the cave, and if so tele them to the next floor. right now i think ill have to set a method for each floor, but i dont wanna add like 40 methods cuz thtll be annoying as fck. basicly im remaking the hpvp jad on a 317 pi

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help with conditional teles (not player right stuff)

you mean like a wave system?
I have one if you want it.
